VASSAL.build.module.map.boardPicker.boar.name: Wheat: -1 EP to unflag Market in North America
Algonquin Raids: Place 1 CM in a Fur Market in North America
Iroquois Raids: Place 1 CM in a Fur Market in North America
Patriot Agitation: Place 1 CM in a Market in North America
Fur Trade: 1 EP (total) to unflag Market in North America
Fruit: -1 EP to unflag Market in Caribbean
Slaving Contracts: Pay 2MP to construct Squadron
Letters of Marque: Place 1 CM in a Caribbean Market not adjacent to opposing Squadron
Pirate Havens: Place 1 CM in a Caribbean Market not adjacent to opposing Squadron
Rum: -1 EP to unflag Market in Caribbean
Textiles: -1EP to unflag Market in India
Silk: -1EP to unflag Market in India
Power Struggle: Place 1 CM in a Carnatic Coast Market
Separatist Wars: Place 1 CM in a Cotton Market
Raids and Incursions: Place 1 CM in an Indian Market
German Diplomacy: Pay 1DP to unflag Russia, Sweden, or Bavaria
Silesia Negotiations: Pay 1DP to unflag space in Prussia or the German States
Italy Influence: Pay 1DP to unflag space in Spain or Austria
Med. Intrigue: Place 1 CM in Spain, Austria, or Sardinia
Naval Bastion: Pay 1 MP to move opposing Squadron to Navy Box
German States • Saxony Alliance Political Space [2]
German States • Saxony Alliance Political Space [3]
